subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Hyun-Jin Ryu, a 26-year-old Dodgers rookie, took the mound at Citi Field, he brought flashbacks of Korean fans watching the former Dodger  Chan Ho Park, with both players  symbols of a nation.
